summary: AN ORDINANCE submitting a proposition to the qualified electors of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held on November 2, 1999, to amend Article VI, Section 2 of the Charter of the City of Seattle, and to delete Article VI, Section 3 of said charter, to eliminate the requirement that a competitive examination be administered to all candidates for Chief of Police; ratifying and confirming prior acts; calling on the City Clerk to certify the proposed amendment to the Director of Records and Elections of King County and directing such Director to submit the proposition to City voters; and providing for the publication of such proposed amendment.
